reviewText: They put a lot of work into this version.  Glad I added this to my collection
It's OK, worth owning.  Quality is good, but I have seen better documentaries; I'd still buy it again.
i am all about the History. and a War that we Never Lost and were not allowed to finish nor win. I could go deeper with what i have learned and this is a good start but also books too.
great movie learned so much thanks

This is a good account and a solid overview of the Vietnam War. Mostly comprised of still images, narrative voice overs, and interviews with Vietnam War Veterans. I was hoping to see more emotion and video footage. There's some popular segments I've seen before in other documentaries and footage libraries that's missing in this series, but this set is highly recommended if you're doing a school paper on the subject.
